問う: (とう) - to ask/to inquire; to charge (e.g. with a crime)/to accuse; (used in neg. form) without regard to/to not matter; (usually in passive form) to call into question/to doubt/to question
問うに落ちず語るに落ちる: (とうにおちずかたるにおちる) - to keep a secret when asked about it, but let it slip inadvertently when chatting on another occasion
問うは一度の恥、問わぬは末代の恥: (とうはいちどのはじ、とわぬはまつだいのはじ) - Better to ask and be embarrassed than not ask and never to know
問うは一旦の恥問わぬは末代の恥: (とうはいったんのはじとわぬはまつだいのはじ) - Better to ask and be embarrassed than not ask and never to know
問わず語り: (とわずがたり) - unprompted remark; unsolicited statement
問切り: (といきり) - last death anniversary for which there is a memorial service held (usu. the 32nd or 49th)
問合せ: (といあわせ) - enquiry; inquiry; ENQ; query; interrogation
問合せる: (といあわせる) - to enquire; to inquire; to seek information
問合せ先: (といあわせさき) - contact information (for inquiries) (e.g. corporate phone number); reference (e.g. personal reference)
問合せ機能: (といあわせきのう) - inquiry function
問合せ端末: (といあわせたんまつ) - inquiry station
問合せ言語: (といあわせげんご) - query language
問合せ関数: (といあわせかんすう) - inquiry function
問合わせる: (といあわせる) - to enquire; to inquire; to seek information
問合先: (といあわせさき) - contact information (for inquiries) (e.g. corporate phone number); reference (e.g. personal reference)
問掛ける: (といかける) - to ask a question; to begin to ask a question
問注所: (もんじゅうしょ) - High Court (of Kamakura); Board of Inquiry
問答: (もんどう) - questions and answers; dialogue
問答無用: (もんどうむよう) - (yoji) there being no use in arguing (about it)
問答無益: (もんどうむえき) - (yoji) there being no use in arguing (about it); being stone-deaf to someone's appeals
問診票: (もんしんひょう) - medical questionnaire; medical interview sheet; medical history form
問診表: (もんしんひょう) - medical questionnaire; medical interview sheet; medical history form
問責: (もんせき) - blame; censure; reproof; reprimand; rebuke
問責決議: (もんせきけつぎ) - (decision to) censure (as issued by the upper house of parliament)
問責決議案: (もんせきけつぎあん) - censure motion
問題: (mondai) - question (por exemplo, em um teste), problem; problem (e.g. societal, political), question, issue, subject (e.g. of research), case, matter , question (e.g. on a test), problem; problem (e.g. societal, political), question, issue, subject (e.g. of research), case, matter; question (i.e. doubt); public discussion, controversy
問題にならない: (もんだいにならない) - unthinkable; count for nothing; not matter; out of the question
問題の点: (もんだいのてん) - point in dispute
問題を取り上げる: (もんだいをとりあげる) - to take up a problem
問題を扱う: (もんだいをあつかう) - to deal with (handle) a matter
問題を詰める: (もんだいをつめる) - to work toward a solution to a problem
問題を避ける: (もんだいをさける) - to avoid a problem
問題作: (もんだいさく) - controversial work (art, literature, etc.); work that caused public criticism; work of art dealing with contemporary questions; succès de scandale
問題債権: (もんだいさいけん) - problem loans
問題劇: (もんだいげき) - controversial or problem play
問題化: (もんだいか) - make an issue or problem of something; something becoming a problem or issue
問題向き言語: (もんだいむきげんご) - problem-oriented language
問題商法: (もんだいしょうほう) - (yoji) unscrupulous (crooked, fraudulent) business practices; pernicious sales methods
問題外: (もんだいがい) - unthinkable; out of the question
問題定義: (もんだいていぎ) - problem definition; problem description
問題意識: (もんだいいしき) - awareness of the issues; (having a) critical mind; concerns
問題提起: (もんだいていき) - raising a question; posing a problem; setting a hare running
問題点: (もんだいてん) - the problem (at issue); the point at issue; problematic issue; problem
問題用紙: (もんだいようし) - question sheet; question paper
問題発言: (もんだいはつげん) - (yoji) problematical statement; controversial statement
問題群: (もんだいぐん) - group of problems; set of issues
問題視: (もんだいし) - viewed as a problem
問題解決能力: (もんだいかいけつのうりょく) - problem-solving ability
問題記述: (もんだいきじゅつ) - problem definition; problem description
問題集: (もんだいしゅう) - question collection; problem collection; problem set; workbook
問題領域: (もんだいりょういき) - problem area
啓上: (けいじょう) - (often used in letters, e.g. as an opening phrase)  speaking respectfully
啓発: (keihatsu) - esclarecimento, desenvolvimento, edificação, conscientização pública, iluminação, educação, inspiração
啓示宗教: (けいじしゅうきょう) - revealed religion
啓蒙専制君主: (けいもうせんせいくんしゅ) - enlightened despot
啓蒙思想: (けいもうしそう) - the philosophy of the European Enlightenment
啓蒙思潮: (けいもうしちょう) - enlightenment movement; the Enlightenment
啓蒙書: (けいもうしょ) - book for novices; general introduction to a subject
啓蒙活動: (けいもうかつどう) - information campaign; awareness program
啓蒙絶対君主: (けいもうぜったいくんしゅ) - enlightened absolutist
啓蒙運動: (けいもううんどう) - enlightenment movement; the Enlightenment
啓蟄: (けいちつ) - "awakening of insects" solar term (approx. Mar. 6, the day on which hibernating insects are said to come out of the ground)
啖う: (くう) - to eat; to live/to make a living/to survive; to bite/to sting (as insects do); to tease/to torment/to taunt/to make light of/to make fun of; to encroach on/to eat into/to consume; to defeat a superior/to threaten a position; to consume time and-or resources; to receive something (usu. an unfavourable event); to have sexual relations with a woman, esp. for the first time
啖呵を切る: (たんかをきる) - to speak sharply (e.g. during a heated discussion or argument)
啜り上げる: (すすりあげる) - (usu. 鼻を...) to sniffle/to snuffle; to sob
啜り込む: (すすりこむ) - to slurp something noisily
啜上げる: (すすりあげる) - (usu. 鼻を...) to sniffle/to snuffle; to sob
啣える: (くわえる) - to hold in one's mouth
啻ならぬ: (ただならぬ) - unusual; uncommon; extraordinary; out of the ordinary; incomparable; serious; alarming
啼き声: (なきごえ) - cry (esp. animal); roar; chirp; tweet; bark; whine; meow
啼く: (なく) - to sing (bird); to bark/to purr/to make sound (animal)
啼兎: (ナキウサギ) - pika (rabbit-like animal of family Ochotonidae)
啼声: (なきごえ) - cry (esp. animal); roar; chirp; tweet; bark; whine; meow
啼鳥: (ていちょう) - chirping bird; singing bird
喀痰検査: (かくたんけんさ) - examination of somebody's sputum
喀血: (かっけつ) - lung hemorrhage; lung haemorrhage
喃語: (なんご) - lover's whispers/sweet nothings/whispered intimacies; baby babble/goo-goo/gaga
